basics.description: **Note:** _There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing._ The SOC Handbook solution for Microsoft Sentinel provides a collection of resources that enable and empower SOC Analysts to get better visibility and understanding of point-in-time security posture of organizational resources. All content packaged in this solution is built and supported by the Microsoft Sentinel community. For any support, please create an [issue](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/issues) on the Microsoft Sentinel GitHub repository. **Workbooks:** 12 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)
